publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1921 Fiona Hyslop: The Draft Protection of Children (Scotland) Act 2003 (Amendment of the Definition of Child Care Position) Order 2008—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Protection of Children (Scotland) Act 2003 (Amendment of the Definition of Child Care Position) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Adam Ingram*, Maureen Watt*

S3M-1921 Fiona Hyslop: The Draft Protection of Children (Scotland) Act 2003 (Amendment of the Definition of Child Care Position) Order 2008—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Protection of Children (Scotland) Act 2003 (Amendment of the Definition of Child Care Position) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Adam Ingram, Maureen Watt
